title: King of Delusions
description: Soujou Hanata spends all his time in his room while living his day to day life working part time at a convenience store. His only hobby is to clear the PC game <King of Delusions>, but one day while returning from an especially tiring day at work, a 'secret mode' is unlocked for him in the game. Suspicious, Hanata clicked on it and woke up to find himself inside <King of Delusions>...
author: Miromiro
